nodes.text: A woman was the former mistress of Dark Prince Xizor of the Black Sun crime syndicate at some point prior to 3 ABY. Xizor, who, on account of his fleeting tastes, often dumped a mate as quickly as he found one, dispatched of the woman with his typical warning to never attempt to make contact with him again. The woman, however, proved to be the only one of Xizor's former companions to ever attempt to communicate with him once he terminated their relationship. As a result, Xizor had the woman murdered by throwing her into a vat of duracrete mix that was later used in the construction of a commercial plex in Coruscant's Southern Enclave.
